Title: A new species of Clavaria from India
Keywords:
Agaricomycetes; alliaceous; biodiversity; Clavariaceae;
coral fungi; systematics
Abstract:
A new species of Clavaria, C.cystidiata, is described and
proposed as new from Kerala State of India, based on morphological and
molecular characters. Morphologically,basiodiomata of C. cystidiata
differs from that of other described Clavaria species by their strong
garlic-smelling yellowish basidiomata, and by the prominent presence of
versiform cystidia. Molecular analyses using nuclear rDNA internal
transcribed spacer (ITS) region also reveals the phylogenetic
distinction of C. cystidiata within the Clavariaceae.
